languages.text: {n}В ее глазах горит лихорадочный блеск, и на устах играет улыбка, но лицо необыкновенно бледно.{/n} "Не смею жаловаться, Ваша Светлость, купаж эмоций — непередаваемый. Признаться, мне не хватало столь острых ощущений в вязкой патоке светской жизни. Но главное — наша пьянящая победа. Это было... невероятно. Ваш образ, излучающий силу и уверенность, все еще стоит у меня перед глазами". {n}Леди губернатор чуть покачивается, не то от охватившей ее слабости, не то от избытка чувств.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В ее глазах горит лихорадочный блеск, и на устах играет улыбка, но лицо необыкновенно бледно.{/n} "Не смею жаловаться, Ваша Светлость, купаж эмоций — непередаваемый. Признаться, мне не хватало столь острых ощущений в вязкой патоке светской жизни. Но главное — наша пьянящая победа. Это было... невероятно. Ваш образ, излучающий силу и уверенность, все еще стоит у меня перед глазами". {n}Леди губернатор чуть покачивается, не то от охватившей ее слабости, не то от избытка чувств.{/n}

languages.text: {n}There is a feverish gleam in Vistenza's eyes and a smile plays on her lips, but her face is strikingly pale.{/n} "I wouldn't dream of complaining, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — it was an inexpressible bouquet of emotions. I must say, such exhilaration was missing from the languid molasses of my court life. But the greatest of all is our intoxicating victory. It was... incredible! If I close my eyes, I can still see your silhouette standing there, radiating power and confidence." {n}The governor sways slightly, either from weakness or out of sheer emotion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une lueur fébrile anime le regard de Vistenza et un sourire effleure ses lèvres, mais son visage affiche une pâleur mortelle.{/n} « Loin de moi l'idée de me plaindre, Votre Seigneurie... ce fut un inexprimable camaïeu d'émotions contraires. Une expérience exaltante dont la langueur monotone de ma vie à la cour est cruellement dépourvue. Mais ce n'est rien à côté de l'ivresse procurée par notre victoire triomphante. Ce fut tout bonnement... incroyable ! Il me suffit de fermer les yeux pour revoir votre auguste silhouette, irradiant la puissance et l'assurance. » {n}La gouverneure chancelle imperceptiblement, que ce soit sous l'effet d'une faiblesse passagère ou d'un vif émoi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is a feverish gleam in Vistenza's eyes and a smile plays on her lips, but her face is strikingly pale.{/n} "I wouldn't dream of complaining, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — it was an inexpressible bouquet of emotions. I must say, such exhilaration was missing from the languid molasses of my court life. But the greatest of all is our intoxicating victory. It was... incredible! If I close my eyes, I can still see your silhouette standing there, radiating power and confidence." {n}The governor sways slightly, either from weakness or out of sheer emotion.{/n}

Une expérience exaltante dont la langueur monotone de ma vie à la cour est cruellement dépourvue. Mais ce n'est rien à côté de l'ivresse procurée par notre victoire triomphante. languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Vistenza brillan con pasión y sonríe, aunque su rostro está pálido.{/n} «Jamás se me ocurriría quejarme, mil{mf|ord|ady}. Ha sido un popurrí de emociones que no puedo expresar. A decir verdad, faltaba esta euforia en la lánguida melaza que es mi vida en los tribunales. Y qué bien sienta que hayamos vencido. Ha sido... ¡increíble! Si cierro los ojos, todavía puedo verl{mf|e|a} a usted ahí parad{mf|o|a}, exudando poder y seguridad». {n}La gobernadora se tambalea ligeramente, desconoces si por debilidad o por pura emoción.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is a feverish gleam in Vistenza's eyes and a smile plays on her lips, but her face is strikingly pale.{/n} "I wouldn't dream of complaining, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — it was an inexpressible bouquet of emotions. I must say, such exhilaration was missing from the languid molasses of my court life. But the greatest of all is our intoxicating victory. It was... incredible! If I close my eyes, I can still see your silhouette standing there, radiating power and confidence." {n}The governor sways slightly, either from weakness or out of sheer emotion.{/n}

Ha sido... ¡increíble! Si cierro los ojos, todavía puedo verl{mf|e|a} a usted ahí parad{mf|o|a}, exudando poder y seguridad». {n}La gobernadora se tambalea ligeramente, desconoces si por debilidad o por pura emoción.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴィステンツァの目には熱っぽい輝きがあり、唇には笑みが浮かんでいたが、その顔色は驚くほど青白い。{/n}「文句なんて夢にも思いませんよ、陛下。 言葉では言い表せない感動の花束でした。私の宮廷生活のだるい日々には、このような高揚感が欠けていました。しかし、何よりも素晴らしいのは、私たちの完全な勝利です。それは…信じられないようなものでした！目を閉じれば力と自信を放ちながらそこに立っている陛下のシルエットがまだ見えます」 {n}総督は、弱さからか、あるいは純粋な感情の高まりからか、わずかに揺れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is a feverish gleam in Vistenza's eyes and a smile plays on her lips, but her face is strikingly pale.{/n} "I wouldn't dream of complaining, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — it was an inexpressible bouquet of emotions. I must say, such exhilaration was missing from the languid molasses of my court life. But the greatest of all is our intoxicating victory. It was... incredible! If I close my eyes, I can still see your silhouette standing there, radiating power and confidence." {n}The governor sways slightly, either from weakness or out of sheer emotion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}维丝坦萨眼中闪烁着狂热的光芒，嘴角挂着笑容，但脸色却异常苍白。{/n}“我根本没有什么可抱怨的，大人，这样的体验实在是令人无法言喻。在我那死气沉沉的宫殿之中，最缺少的就是这样的刺激。不过，最令人欢愉的部分，还是当属我们那令人陶醉的胜利。这实在是……太让人难以置信了！哪怕我现在闭上眼睛，我依然能看到您的身影坚定地立在那里，浑身散发着力量与信心。”{n}维丝坦萨总督身体微微摇晃着，可能是由于虚弱，也可能是由于过于激动。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is a feverish gleam in Vistenza's eyes and a smile plays on her lips, but her face is strikingly pale.{/n} "I wouldn't dream of complaining, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — it was an inexpressible bouquet of emotions. I must say, such exhilaration was missing from the languid molasses of my court life. But the greatest of all is our intoxicating victory. It was... incredible! If I close my eyes, I can still see your silhouette standing there, radiating power and confidence." {n}The governor sways slightly, either from weakness or out of sheer emotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}维丝坦萨眼中闪烁着狂热的光芒，嘴角挂着笑容，但脸色却异常苍白。{/n}“我根本没有什么可抱怨的，大人，这样的体验实在是令人无法言喻。在我那死气沉沉的宫殿之中，最缺少的就是这样的刺激。不过，最令人欢愉的部分，还是当属我们那令人陶醉的胜利。这实在是……太让人难以置信了！哪怕我现在闭上眼睛，我依然能看到您的身影坚定地立在那里，浑身散发着力量与信心。”{n}维丝坦萨总督身体微微摇晃着，可能是由于虚弱，也可能是由于过于激动。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du erkennst einen fiebrigen Glanz in Vistenzas Augen. Ein Lächeln umspielt ihre Lippen, aber ihr Gesicht ist aschfahl.{/n} "Ich würde nicht im Traum daran denken, mich zu beschweren, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... es war eine unbeschreibliche Fülle von Emotionen. Ich muss sagen, eine derartige Heiterkeit hat mir in der langweiligen Melasse meines höfischen Lebens gefehlt. Aber das Beste ist unser berauschender Sieg. Das war ... unglaublich. Wenn ich meine Augen schließe, sehe ich noch Eure Silhouette voller Macht und Selbstvertrauen." {n}Die Gouverneurin schwankt leicht, sie es aus Schwäche oder schierer Emotion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is a feverish gleam in Vistenza's eyes and a smile plays on her lips, but her face is strikingly pale.{/n} "I wouldn't dream of complaining, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — it was an inexpressible bouquet of emotions. I must say, such exhilaration was missing from the languid molasses of my court life. But the greatest of all is our intoxicating victory. It was... incredible! If I close my eyes, I can still see your silhouette standing there, radiating power and confidence." {n}The governor sways slightly, either from weakness or out of sheer emotion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vistenza'nın gözlerine hararetli bir parıltı, dudaklarına süregelen bir gülümseme hâkim olsa da yüzü olağanüstü derecede solgun.{/n} "Şikâyet etmeyi aklımdan bile geçirmiyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Tarifsiz bir duygu karmaşası yaşadım. İtiraf etmeliyim ki saray hayatımın kağnı gibi ilerleyen akışında böylesi neşelerin eksikliğini duyuyorum. Ancak en önemlisi, mest edici zaferimiz oldu. Muazzamdı! Gözlerimi kapatırsam şurada güçle ve kendine güvenle ışıldayarak duran silüetinizi hâlâ görebilirim." {n}Vali, ya zayıf düşmekten ya da katıksız duygu selinden hafifçe yalpalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is a feverish gleam in Vistenza's eyes and a smile plays on her lips, but her face is strikingly pale.{/n} "I wouldn't dream of complaining, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — it was an inexpressible bouquet of emotions. I must say, such exhilaration was missing from the languid molasses of my court life. But the greatest of all is our intoxicating victory. It was... incredible! If I close my eyes, I can still see your silhouette standing there, radiating power and confidence." {n}The governor sways slightly, either from weakness or out of sheer emotion.{/n}
